title: El Score font
content:
Hi friends

Please help me ID the font used for El Score

Thanks in advance

Hernando

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091121204831im_/http:/typophile.com/files/el_score_4255.gif)
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content:
Thank you for your help,

is there a font close to this one ?

any help is appreciated

Hernando
I do agree this is lettered. But, you might get lucky if you search for “Art Nouveau” at MyFonts.

I think there was an Art Nouveau typeface called Harquil that was similar to these letters. HiH has a similar font they call [Gaiety Girl](http://web.archive.org/web/20091121204831/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/hihretrofonts/gaiety-girl/) that might work.

- Mike Yanega
